attributes.action: acknowledge reality and recognise that Mr Mugabe/Zanu PF are not legitimate representatives of the Zimbabwean people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Title says it all - a peoples representatives must be legitimate. Mugabe/Zanu are plainly not - the UK government should not insult the UK people by pretending otherwise.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
